entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries at times heavy and a few local snow squalls beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and a few snow squalls ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
